remarks: An operation is countable if both its domains are countable. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Sep-2017.)
statement:
mpt2cti.1 $e |- A. x e. A A. y e. B C e. V $.
mpt2cti $p |- ( ( A ~<_ _om /\ B ~<_ _om ) -> ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) ~<_ _om ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x $.
$d B x y $.
